name: pokemon-pokedex-monorepo
description: Pokemon Pokedex application with Next.js and GraphQL

scripts.build: npm run build:server && npm run build:client
scripts.lint: npm run lint:client && npm run lint:server
scripts.lint:server: cd server && npm run lint || echo 'Server lint not configured'
scripts.type-check: npm run type-check:client && npm run type-check:server
scripts.type-check:client: cd client && npm run type-check || echo 'Client type-check not configured'
scripts.type-check:server: cd server && npm run type-check || echo 'Server type-check not configured'
scripts.clean: npm run clean:client && npm run clean:server
scripts.postinstall: cd client && npm install && cd ../server && npm install
